CustomField.formula: CASE(Product_Description__c, "Machinery", "General Cargo", "Packing Material", "General Cargo", "Coloured & Gem Stones", "Valuable", "Cut & Polished Diamonds", "Valuable", "Diamond Jewellery", "Valuable", "Dore Bar", "Valuable", "Gold Bar", "Valuable", "Gold Coin", "Valuable", "Gold Jewellery", "Valuable", "Platinum Jewellery", "Valuable", "Diamond Powder", "Vulnerable", "Imitation Jewellery", "Vulnerable", "Silver Bar", "Vulnerable", "Silver Coin", "Vulnerable", "Silver Jewellery", "Vulnerable", "Other", "Perishable", null)
CustomField.label: Cargo Type
